channel.title: ngacareer on github
channel.description: Recent content on ngacareer on github

item.title: Triuhv
item.description: About me Hello All, I’m TriuHV. I create educational content in ngacareer. I started this channel on Jan 01, 2021 with the idea to Learn, Code and Share knowledge on the latest technology trends. Since then I have learnt, written and shared lots of code in Github. This repository/github page is dedicated to you all. If you have not contributed to Open Source before, then this is your chance to contribute.

item.title: Conferences
item.description: Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners. Table of Contents January 2021 February 2021 March 2021 April 2021 May 2021 June 2021 September 2021 Missing any conference? January 2021 Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments AWS re:Invent 12 - 14 Jan 2021 Register Virtual (Free) EST jChampions Conferences (Java & Open Source) 13 - 19 Jan 2021 Register Virtual (Free) EST Google Cloud Community Day 22, 23 Jan 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST Amazon AI Conclave 2021 28, 29 Jan 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST TestJS Summit 28, 29 Jan 2021 Register Virtual(Chargeable) EST Azure Kubernetes Day 30 Jan 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST February 2021 Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments Postman Galaxy 2020 2 - 4 Feb 2021 Register Virtual (Conference - Free, Workshops - Chargeable) PST DATAcated Conference 2021 9 - 11 Feb 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST Node Congress 18, 19 Feb 2021 Register Virtual (Free + Chargeable) EST March 2021 Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments Devops.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: In this theme we will be using MathJax 2.7 To enable MathJax globally set the parameter math to true in a project’s configuration To enable MathJax on a per page basis include the parameter math: true in content files Note: Use the online reference of MathJax TeX and LaTeX Support Examples Inline math: $\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦$ Block math: $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
